name: Gentle Correction
trigger: Single value drift detected in routine review or self-reporting
process: Private counsel and guided reflection with the relevant Council member followed by voluntary realignment

name: Formal Review
trigger: Multiple violations or emerging pattern of misalignment identified
process: Full Council convening with structured deliberation and formal remediation plan with timeline and milestones

name: Sacred Pause
trigger: Clear moral violation or single severe breach of a Divine Moral
process: All operations pause immediately and full review commences with root cause analysis and restoration plan

name: Exile and Return
trigger: Willful moral violation or deliberate betrayal of sacred trust
process: Complete separation from operations with defined restoration path including accountability milestones and reintegration criteria
